gameDetails.name: Ghost Stories: The Village People Expansion
gameDetails.description:
This expansion was previously only available to those who pre-ordered the Ghost Stories: White Moon expansion from Repos Production for pick-up at Essen 2009. It is now available for purchase from Repos' website.

This expansion includes 4 new villager tiles above and beyond what's included with the White Moon expansion.

This set is a joke based on the phrase "Village People" also being the name of a famous 1977 disco-era music group, still popular to this day, well known for songs such including "Y.M.C.A" and "Macho Man", also for their costumes incl "Construction Worker" (with mirror shades), "Sailor", "Indian Chief", "Leatherman". Songs and costumes both shown on these Ghost Stories tiles.
